name: Lost End
storyline: You can explore cafes, basketball clubs, hot springs and other places in the game. You can also develop a protagonist and perform operations such as song writing, part-time job, street performance, etc. At the same time, the game also has a lot of characters and plots, all the characters can be attacked. As long as you visit characters in the game for gifts and dates, you can increase your favorability!
summary: Lost End is a high degree of freedom game that combines text and cultivation. Players will control the protagonist to experience a youthful senior year and capture a lot of orc characters.
